response.message: Man, I can't believe I missed this !! Going to have to contribute with my votes then.

Wow, look at those creative juices. Will try to download them out tonight and vote :)

And for any students out there looking for another programming competition (with some really nice prizes), please take a look at the Windward Code War - http://www.windward.net/code_war.php

thanks - dave
